sentences.sentence: He threw one of the biggest showbiz bashes of the year as a 36th birthday party for Jerry Hall.
sentences.translation: 他为杰里•霍耳的36岁生日举行了该年度娱乐界最盛大的名流派对。

sentences.sentence: She gives showbiz parties a wide berth.
sentences.translation: 她对娱乐聚会敬而远之。

sentences.sentence: But justice and showbiz are different.
sentences.translation: 然而司法和娱乐是不同的。
